mapper.delete: delete from ds_areatrade_store where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.update: update ds_storetrade aa, ds_areatrade_store bb ,ds_areapubseas_trade_store cc set bb.pubseas = aa.pesgmv - bb.pesgmv - cc.pesgmv where aa.storeno = bb.storeno and aa.storeno = cc.storeno and aa.`year`= bb.`year` and aa.`month` = bb.`month` and aa.`year`= cc.`year` and aa.`month` = cc.`month` and aa.`year` = #{year} and aa.`month`= #{month}
